title: Bandbox And Lid, "William Henry Harrison", ca. 1840
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Frederick F. Thompson
description: Political campaign attack on General Harrison, shown standing in front of a log cabin. A barrel of cider sits next to the door. In the background is the Ohio River with a paddle wheel boat. Printed in colors on a blue ground. On lid: Scene with a castle on the summit of a mountain across a lake with sailboat with three men seated in the stern. There are buildings to the left and across the lake to the right. Scene is enclosed in a floral wreath.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bandbox And Lid, "William Henry Harrison", ca. 1840.
ca. 1840. Block-printed paper on pasteboard support. Gift of Mrs. Frederick F. Thompson. 1913-45-7-a,b.
